actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of certain expenses allocable to the use of a residence in providing music lessons.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow an income tax deduction of business expenses allocable to the use of a residence in providing music lessons.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow the deduction of certain expenses allocable to the use of a residence in providing music lessons.
